PRES·149★ | Lathliss, Dragon Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的龙在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个5/5红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: PRES·149★ | Lathliss, Dragon Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}：由你操控的龙得+1/+0直到回合结束。
